description.english: Complete the Initiation mission.
Earn 60 gold medals in Challenge mode.
Accept your first Promotion.
Become a Nemesis 50 times.
Finish one match of Gotham City Impostors.
Unlock any locked loadout or costume item.
Win each game mode in Ace Chemical, Amusement Mile, Crime Alley, Gotham Power and The Docks.
Turn the tables in Fumigation when the enemy team's victory is imminent.
Win 1 mid-air Dive Bomb duels.
Kill 75 enemies by Dive Bombing.
Kill 250 enemies that are tagged by Targeting Goggles.
Tag 500 enemies with the Targeting Goggles.
Glide 70 total kilometers.
Grapple 50 total kilometers.
Kill 25 enemies with a Grapple Gun impact.
Kill 250 enemies while Double-Jumping.
Use the Inflated Insoles 1000 times.
Travel 7 kilometers while invisible.
Travel 30 total kilometers while the Jetpack is active.
Kill 7 enemies by dropping onto them with the Jetpack.
Kill 250 enemies while the Jetpack is active.
Travel 100 kilometers on Roller Skates.
Get 250 kills while Rollerskating.
Kill 7 enemies while jumping a Skate Ramp on Rollerskates.
Jump a Skate Ramp 75 times.
Kill 30 enemies by landing on them with Spring Boots.
Use the Spring Boots 1000 times.
Kill 100 enemies within 5 seconds of becoming visible.
Attach the Battery 25 times.
Detach the Battery 25 times.
Pick up a dropped Battery 25 times.
Kill an enemy carrying the Battery 150 times.
Capture 250 Gasblasters.
Defend 250 Gasblasters.
In Fumigation, finish a match in first place 10 times.

Successfully release enough Joker Gas to cause a Fumigation Defeat for the Bats 25 times.
Kill 25 Demoralized enemies in Psych Warfare.

In Psych Warfare, finish a match in first place 10 times.
In Psych Warfare, appear in the end-match lineup 25 times.
Complete 50 matches of Psych Warfare.
In Team Deathmatch, finish a match in first place 10 times.
In Team Deathmatch, appear in the end-match lineup 25 times.
Complete 50 matches of Team Deathmatch.

Collect 100 enemy tokens.
Retrieve 100 teammate tokens.
Complete 50 matches of Bounty Hunter.
Earn a Kill Assist 50000 times.
Deal 25000000 damage points.
Travel 21000 kilometers (Multiplayer Only).
Finish in first place 250 times.
Finish in the top 3 lineup 500 times.
Kill 32000 enemies with headshots.

Kill 64000 enemies.
Play 10000 matches to completion.
